text: Partition type (metal, plastic, phenolic, HDPE) and layout match submittals and architectural drawings
Accessories (grab bars, dispensers, mirrors, hooks, bins) match finish schedule and spec
Finish, color, mounting height, and orientation (left/right hand) confirmed
Anchors and backing appropriate for substrate (drywall, CMU, tile, etc.)
Pilasters plumb, panels square, doors operate smoothly
Gaps consistent and privacy maintained at front and between panels
Mounting system (overhead braced / floor mounted / ceiling hung) matches spec
Accessories mounted at correct heights and positions per accessibility code (ADA/CSA B651)
Grab bars installed at correct length, height, and anchoring points
Soap, paper towel, and toilet paper dispensers installed as per reflected room layouts
Mirrors installed at correct height, securely anchored
Baby change stations and waste receptacles installed per manufacturer instructions
All units clean, operational, and securely fastened
No sharp edges, misalignments, missing parts
Consultant and accessibility compliance inspection passed

id: • NBC Part 3, ADA, CSA B651 – Accessibility & Mounting Heights
• ASTM A123, ASTM A167, NAAMM 500 Series, LEED
• Manufacturer Specs: Bobrick, ASI, Bradley, Hadrian, Scranton, Koala Kare
